title: Sprint 06: Advanced Database & Performance
description: Optimizing data interaction, handling complexity, and ensuring performance at scale.
items: 01- Database Transactions: DB::transaction(), manual begin/commit, Deadlocks, Retries
02- Advanced Indexing: Composite indexes, unique constraints, fulltext, covering indexes
03- Query Performance: EXPLAIN statements, identifying slow queries, avoiding SELECT *
04- Raw SQL: When to drop to raw, DB::raw() safety, parameter bindings to prevent SQLi
05- Large Datasets: chunk(), chunkById(), cursor() for memory efficient processing
06- Pruning: Prunable models, mass pruning old data automated strategies
07- Caching Queries: Remember() pattern, caching repository decorators
08- Read/Write Splitting: Configuring read replicas in database.php, sticky connections
09- Subqueries: addSelect subqueries, whereIn subqueries, ordering by subquery
10- JSON Columns: Querying JSON data, indexing JSON paths (MySQL/PG differences)
11- Cross-Database Relationships: Connecting models across DB connections (federated)
12- Hardware/Drivers: MySQL vs PostgreSQL nuances, pdo configuration optimizations
14- Database Testing: RefreshDatabase, Model factories, Asserting database state
15- Monitoring: DB::listen() for query inspection, Telescope watcher for queries
